title: Islamic City Council of Tabriz
text:
The Islamic City Council of Tabriz () is the elected <a href="City%20council">council</a> that presides over the city of <a href="Tabriz">Tabriz</a>, elects the <a href="Mayor%20of%20Tabriz">Mayor of Tabriz</a>, and budgets of the <a href="Tabriz">Municipality of Tabriz</a>. The council is composed of twenty-one members elected from single-member districts for four-year terms. The Chairman and the Deputy Chairman of the Council are chosen by the council at the first regular meeting in odd-numbered years. In the last <a href="Iranian%20local%20elections%2C%202013">election</a> between <a href="Iranian%20Principlists">Principlists</a> and <a href="Iranian%20reform%20movement">reformers</a>, <a href="Iranian%20Principlists">Principlists</a> won the most seats.
Members.
4th term (2013–2017).
